The user's goal is to take a photo of the house after switching the view mode in Simple Gallery Pro.
The user has opened the app and clicked on the "More options" button (UI element 15).
The screenshot shows a menu with options like "Sort by", "Filter media", "Change view type", etc.
The user's intention was to switch the view mode before taking a photo.
Clicking on "More options" opened a menu, and the option to "Change view type" (UI element 14) is present in the menu.
However, the user has not yet selected the "Change view type" option.
Therefore, the user has not yet switched the view mode.
Since the user has not switched the view mode and taken a photo, the goal has not been achieved.

Therefore, the user has not yet switched the view mode, and the goal of taking a photo after switching the view mode has not been achieved.

The user's goal is to take a photo of the house after switching the view mode in Simple Gallery Pro. The user has opened the app, clicked on "More options", and then clicked on "Change view type". The screenshot shows a dialog with options "Grid", "List", and "Group direct subfolders". "Grid" is currently selected. The user needs to select a view type and click "OK" to apply the change. However, the user has not yet taken the photo. The current action only involves changing the view type.

The user has changed the view type, but they have not yet taken the photo. Therefore, the user has not yet achieved their goal.
